62 class image_feature:
63 
64  def __init__(self):
65  '''Initialize ros publishers, ros subscribers'''
66  rospy.init_node('image_feature', anonymous=True)
67  # topic where we publish
68  self.image_pub = rospy.Publisher("output/image_raw/compressed",
69  CompressedImage, queue_size=1)
70  self.vel_pub = rospy.Publisher("cmd_vel",
71  Twist, queue_size=1)
72  self.ballcolor_pub = rospy.Publisher("ball_color",
73  String , queue_size=1)
74  self.ang_pub = rospy.Publisher("joint1_position_controller/command",
75  Float64, queue_size=3)
76  self.detection_pub = rospy.Publisher("object_detection",
77  Int32, queue_size=3)
78  self.explore_abilitation_pub = rospy.Publisher("explore_abilitation",
79  Int32, queue_size=3)
80  # subscribed Topic
81  self.subscriber = rospy.Subscriber("camera1/image_raw/compressed",
82  CompressedImage, self.callback, queue_size=1)
83 
84  self.substate = rospy.Subscriber("miro_state",
85  Int32, self.statecallback, queue_size=1)
86  self.sub_odom = rospy.Subscriber('/odom', Odometry, self.clbk_odom)
87 
88  def clbk_odom(self, msg):
89  global position_
90  global yaw_
91 
92  # position
93  position_ = msg.pose.pose.position
94 
95  global xc
96  xc = position_.x
97  global yc
98  yc = position_.y
99 
100  # yaw
101  quaternion = (
102  msg.pose.pose.orientation.x,
103  msg.pose.pose.orientation.y,
104  msg.pose.pose.orientation.z,
105  msg.pose.pose.orientation.w)
106  euler = transformations.euler_from_quaternion(quaternion)
107  yaw_ = euler[2]
108 
109  def statecallback(self, data):
110  """Callback to miro read state from a topic
111 
112 
113  """
114  global mirostate
115  mirostate = data.data
116 
117  def callback(self, ros_data):
118  '''Callback function of subscribed topic.
119  Here images get converted and features detected
120  If a ball is detected a message will be setn to the state machine
121  when the state machine will commute to the PLAY state the function will send
122  cmd_vel msg to the robot'''
123  global reached
124  if VERBOSE:
125  print ('received image of type: "%s"' % ros_data.format)
126 
127  #### direct conversion to CV2 ####
128  np_arr = np.fromstring(ros_data.data, np.uint8)
129  image_np = cv2.imdecode(np_arr, cv2.IMREAD_COLOR) # OpenCV >= 3.0:
130 
131  #range of color for the segmentation
132 
133 
134  blackLower = (0, 0, 0)
135  blackUpper = (5,50,50)
136 
137  redLower = (0, 50, 50)
138  redUpper = (5, 255, 255)
139 
140  yellowLower = (25, 50, 50)
141  yellowUpper = (35, 255, 255)
142 
143  greenLower = (50, 50, 50)
144  greenUpper = (70, 255, 255)
145 
146  blueLower = (100, 50, 50)
147  blueUpper = (130, 255, 255)
148 
149  magentaLower = (125, 50, 50)
150  magentaUpper = (150, 255, 255)
151 
152  # look for the centrodes of all the colors
153 
154  cntsg = find_centrodes(greenLower, greenUpper, np_arr, image_np)
155  cntsbk = find_centrodes(blackLower, blackUpper, np_arr, image_np)
156  cntsr = find_centrodes(redLower, redUpper, np_arr, image_np)
157  cntsy = find_centrodes(yellowLower, yellowUpper, np_arr, image_np)
158  cntsbl = find_centrodes(blueLower, blueUpper, np_arr, image_np)
159  cntsm = find_centrodes(magentaLower, magentaUpper, np_arr, image_np)
160 
161 
162  arr =np.array( [[cntsg, len(cntsg), 'green'],
163  [cntsbk, len(cntsbk), 'black'],
164  [cntsr, len(cntsr), 'red'],
165  [cntsy, len(cntsy), 'yellow'],
166  [cntsbl, len(cntsbl), 'blue'],
167  [cntsm, len(cntsm), 'magenta']] )
168 
169  #print(arr)
170  """ np.sort(arr, axis=1)
171  arr[arr[:,1].argsort()] """
172  # arr[np.lexsort(arr.T[1])]
173  sortedArr = arr[arr[:,1].argsort()]
174 
175  #print(arr)
176  #print("lun", len(cntsr))
177  #print (sortedArr)
178  global found_green
179  global found_black
180  global found_red
181  global found_magenta
182  global found_yellow
183  global found_blue
184 
185  cnts = sortedArr[5][0]
186  ballcolor = sortedArr[5][2]
187  #if len(cnts)>0:
188  #print (cnts, ballcolor, 'detected')
189 
190  if ballcolor == "green":
191  if found_green == 1:
192  cnts =""
193  print (ballcolor, "already found")
194  elif ballcolor == "black":
195  if found_black == 1:
196  cnts = ""
197  print (ballcolor, "already found")
198  elif ballcolor == "blue":
199  if found_blue == 1:
200  cnts = ""
201  print (ballcolor, "already found")
202  elif ballcolor == "red":
203  if found_red == 1:
204  cnts = ""
205  print (ballcolor, "already found")
206  elif ballcolor == "magenta":
207  if found_magenta == 1:
208  cnts = ""
209  print (ballcolor, "already found")
210  elif ballcolor == "yellow":
211  if found_yellow== 1:
212  cnts = ""
213  print (ballcolor, "already found")
214 
215 
216 
217  center = None
218 
219 
220  # only proceed if at least one contour was found
221  if len(cnts) > 0 :
222  # find the largest contour in the mask, then use
223  # it to compute the minimum enclosing circle and
224  # centroid
225  c = max(cnts, key=cv2.contourArea)
226  ((x, y), radius) = cv2.minEnclosingCircle(c)
227  M = cv2.moments(c)
228  center = (int(M["m10"] / M["m00"]), int(M["m01"] / M["m00"]))
229  """ detected = Int32()
230  detected.data = 1 """
231  """ self.detection_pub.publish(detected) """
232  #print ('radius', radius, 'mirostate', mirostate)
233  #print ('mirostate: [%d]' % mirostate)
234  # only proceed if the radius meets a minimum size
235  print ('radius0 ', radius)
236  if radius >32:
237  detected = Int32()
238  detected.data = 1
239  self.detection_pub.publish(detected)
240  sleep(0.05)
241 
242  global ball_seen
243  if (radius > 27 and mirostate == 3) or ball_seen==1:
244  ball_seen = 1
245  # draw the circle and centroid on the frame,
246  # then update the list of tracked points
247  cv2.circle(image_np, (int(x), int(y)), int(radius),
248  (0, 255, 255), 2)
249  cv2.circle(image_np, center, 5, (0, 0, 255), -1)
250  vel = Twist()
251  vel.angular.z = -0.002*(center[0]-400)
252  vel.linear.x = -0.01*(radius-100)
253  #print(reached)
254  global xc
255  global yc
256 
257  if reached !=1:
258  explore_abilitation = Int32()
259  explore_abilitation.data = 0
260  self.vel_pub.publish(vel)
261 
262 
263  self.explore_abilitation_pub.publish(explore_abilitation)
264 
265 
266  if radius > 70:
267  print ('color', ballcolor)
268  vel.angular.z = 0
269  vel.linear.x = 0
270  self.vel_pub.publish(vel)
271  time.sleep(1)
272  print ('position: "%f, %f"' % (xc, yc))
273  reached = 1
274  explore_abilitation = Int32()
275  explore_abilitation.data = 1
276  self.explore_abilitation_pub.publish(explore_abilitation)
277  if ballcolor == "green":
278  found_green = 1
279  print (ballcolor, "found")
280  elif ballcolor == "black":
281  found_black = 1
282  print (ballcolor, "found")
283  elif ballcolor == "blue":
284  found_blue = 1
285  print (ballcolor, "found")
286  elif ballcolor == "red":
287  found_red = 1
288  print (ballcolor, "found")
289  elif ballcolor == "magenta":
290  found_magenta = 1
291  print (ballcolor, "found")
292  elif ballcolor == "yellow":
293  found_yellow = 1
294  print (ballcolor, "found")
295  ballc_m = String()
296  ballc_m.data = ballcolor
297  self.ballcolor_pub.publish(ballc_m)
298  sleep(0.05)
299  detected = Int32()
300  detected.data = 1
301  self.detection_pub.publish(detected)
302  ball_seen = 0
303 
304 
305  #rospy.loginfo('%d'%reached)
306 
307 
308  else:
309  #new ball not found
310  detected = Int32()
311  detected.data = 0
312  self.detection_pub.publish(detected)
313  reached = 0
314 
315  cv2.imshow('window', image_np)
316  cv2.waitKey(2)

319 
320 def find_centrodes(lower, upper, np_arr, image_np):
321  ''' Applies the segmentation to the image depending on the upper and lower bounds and returns the centrodes.
322 
323  '''
324  blurred = cv2.GaussianBlur(image_np, (11, 11), 0)
325  hsv = cv2.cvtColor(blurred, cv2.COLOR_BGR2HSV)
326  mask = cv2.inRange(hsv, lower, upper)
327  mask = cv2.erode(mask, None, iterations=2)
328  mask = cv2.dilate(mask, None, iterations=2)
329  #ballcolor = "green"
330  #cv2.imshow('mask', mask)
331  cnts = cv2.findContours(mask.copy(), cv2.RETR_EXTERNAL, cv2.CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE)
332  cnts = imutils.grab_contours(cnts)
333  #print (cnts)
334  return cnts
335 
336 
337 def main(args):
338  '''Initializes and cleanup ros node'''
339  ic = image_feature()
340  try:
341  rospy.spin()
342  except KeyboardInterrupt:
343  print ("Shutting down ROS Image feature detector module")
344  cv2.destroyAllWindows()
345 
346 
347 if __name__ == '__main__':
348  main(sys.argv)
